body_html:
@Carmezim I am using Windows 8.1 - 64 bit - Python 3.5.1 distribution downloaded from python.Org

I have installed using the command

pip install --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/windows/cpu/tensorflow-1.0.0-cp35-cp35m-win_amd64.whl

I just entered this code and the installation works well without any interruption. But when I am trying to import the tensorflow from the python software, the problem occurs.I have installed Microsoft Visual C++ 2015 Redistribute Update 3 also. But still not working !!

body:
@Carmezim  I am using Windows 8.1 - 64 bit - Python 3.5.1 distribution downloaded from python.Org
 
I have installed using the command

> pip install --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/windows/cpu/tensorflow-1.0.0-cp35-cp35m-win_amd64.whl


I just entered this code and the installation works well without any interruption. But when I am trying to import the tensorflow from the python software, the problem occurs.I have installed Microsoft Visual C++ 2015 Redistribute Update 3 also. But still not working !!
